Posts.Content: May 2, 2019 02:36PM CaptBreast wrote: I had my surgery in January and finished radiation March 22. The last couple of days I’ve noticed alot of pain there too. From my under arm to the scar. It feels sometimes like I have a bruise. II have been working ot a-lot so I don't know if that aggravate it too. This is the first time I posted. I was looking to see if anyone else had the same feeling too. Thanks for starting this thread
Posts.Title: Painful Lumpectomy Scar Tissue? kec1972 kec1972
